name: Rustic Puri Tour
description:
The ‘Rustic Puri Tour’ will take the visitors to several places of historical and religious importance. This tour will require almost three hours to get complete and the timings has been chosen in a way, it will offer the best of Puri’s rustic life.

Since the tour comprises of walking through the sacred city, the visitors can adore themselves with the most authentic experience of the city. While on this tour, the visitors can also taste the magnificence of Puri’s mouth-watering delicacy and can bring home, an everlasting memory of the holy city of Lord Jagannath.
